mapper.select:
select count(1) from t_equipment_bbu where network_type=#{equipmentBBU.networkType}
and bbu_name like '%${equipmentBBU.bbuName}%'
select * from t_equipment_bbu where id in (${ids})
select * from t_equipment_rru_aau where id in (${ids})
select * from t_equipment_bf where id in (${ids})

insert.foreach:
insert into t_equipment_bbu ( dx_code,bbu_code,bbu_name,power, network_type) values (#{item.dxCode},#{item.bbuCode},#{item.bbuName},#{item.power}, #{item.networkType})
dx_code=#{item.dxCode}, bbu_name=#{item.bbuName}, power=#{item.power}, network_type=#{item.networkType}

mapper.delete: delete from t_equipment_bbu where id in(${ids})
mapper.select: select * from t_equipment_bbu where id =#{id}
mapper.update:
update t_equipment_bbu
dx_code = #{equipmentBBU.dxCode},
bbu_code = #{equipmentBBU.bbuCode},
bbu_name = #{equipmentBBU.bbuName},
power = #{equipmentBBU.power},
id = #{equipmentBBU.id}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from t_equipment_rru_aau where network_type=#{equipmentRRUAAU.networkType}
and rru_name like '%${equipmentRRUAAU.rruName}%'

select count(1) from t_equipment_olt
and olt_name like '%${equipmentOLT.oltName}%'

select count(1) from t_equipment_bf
and bf_name like '%${equipmentBoFen.bfName}%'

SELECT dx_code as dxCode,
count(0) as threeRruCount,
count(0) as fourRruCount,
count(0) as fiveAauCount,
sum(power) as power FROM t_equipment_rru_aau WHERE dx_code IN
#{item}
and network_type=#{type} GROUP BY dx_code ,network_type

SELECT dx_code as dxCode,
count(0) as threeBbuCount,
count(0) as fourBbuCount,
count(0) as fiveBbuCount,
sum(power) as power FROM t_equipment_bbu WHERE dx_code IN
#{item}
and network_type=#{type} GROUP BY dx_code ,network_type
mapper.delete: delete from t_equipment_rru_aau where id in(${ids})
delete from t_equipment_bf where id in(${ids})
mapper.select: select * from t_equipment_rru_aau where id =#{id}
mapper.update:
update t_equipment_rru_aau
dx_code = #{equipmentRRUAAU.dxCode},
rru_code = #{equipmentRRUAAU.rruCode},
rru_name = #{equipmentRRUAAU.rruName},
power = #{equipmentRRUAAU.power},
id = #{equipmentRRUAAU.id}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from t_base_station
and base_name like '%${sitManager.baseName}%'
select * from t_base_station where id in(${ids})
mapper.update:
update t_base_station
three_bbu_count = three_bbu_count + #{threeBbuCount}, three_bbu_power = three_bbu_power + #{power},
four_bbu_count = four_bbu_count + #{fourBbuCount}, four_bbu_power = four_bbu_power + #{power},
five_bbu_count = five_bbu_count + #{fiveBbuCount}, five_bbu_power = five_bbu_power + #{power},
three_rru_count = three_rru_count + #{threeRruCount}, three_rru_power = three_rru_power + #{power},
four_rru_count = four_rru_count + #{fourRruCount}, four_rru_power = four_rru_power + #{power},
five_aau_count = five_aau_count + #{fiveAauCount}, five_aau_power = five_aau_power + #{power},
olt_count = olt_count + #{oltCount}, olt_power = olt_power + #{power},
ipran_count = ipran_count + #{ipranCount}, ipran_power = ipran_power + #{power},
bf_count = ipran_count + #{bfCount}, bf_power = ipran_power + #{power},
power_Consume =three_bbu_power+four_bbu_power+five_bbu_power+three_rru_power+four_rru_power+five_aau_power+olt_power+ipran_power+bf_power
dx_code = #{dxCode}

insert.foreach:
insert into t_base_station (base_name,base_property,dx_code,tt_code,remark,rentPayer,latitude,longitude,powerMan) values(#{item.baseName},#{item.baseProperty},#{item.dxCode},#{item.ttCode},#{item.remark},#{item.rentPayer},#{item.latitude},#{item.longitude},#{item.powerMan})
base_name=#{item.baseName}, base_property=#{item.baseProperty}, tt_code=#{item.ttCode}, rentPayer=#{item.rentPayer}, remark=#{item.remark}, latitude=#{item.latitude}, longitude=#{item.longitude}, powerMan=#{item.powerMan},

mapper.select: select * from t_equipment_olt where id in (${ids})
select * from t_equipment_olt where id =#{id}
mapper.update:
update t_equipment_olt
dx_code = #{equipmentOLT.dxCode},
olt_code = #{equipmentOLT.oltCode},
olt_name = #{equipmentOLT.oltName},
power = #{equipmentOLT.power},
id = #{equipmentOLT.id}

update t_equipment_bf
dx_code = #{equipmentBoFen.dxCode},
bf_code = #{equipmentBoFen.bfCode},
bf_name = #{equipmentBoFen.bfName},
power = #{equipmentBoFen.power},
id = #{equipmentBoFen.id}
mapper.delete: delete from t_equipment_olt where id in (${ids})
mapper.select: select * from t_equipment_olt where id in (${ids})
select * from t_equipment_olt limit #{startIndex},#{endIndex}

select count(1) from t_equipment_ipran
and ipran_name like '%${equipmentIPRAN.ipranName}%'
select * from t_equipment_ipran where id in (${ids})
select * from t_equipment_ipran where id =#{id}
mapper.update:
update t_equipment_ipran
dx_code = #{equipmentIPRAN.dxCode},
ipran_code = #{equipmentIPRAN.ipranCode},
ipran_name = #{equipmentIPRAN.ipranName},
power = #{equipmentIPRAN.power},
id = #{equipmentIPRAN.id}
mapper.delete: delete from t_equipment_ipran where id in (${ids})
delete from t_base_station where id in (${ids})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_base_station t SET t.three_bbu_count = (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM t_equipment_bbu b WHERE t.dx_code=b.dx_code and b.network_type=3), t.three_bbu_power = (SELECT sum(power) FROM t_equipment_bbu b WHERE t.dx_code=b.dx_code and b.network_type=3); UPDATE t_base_station t SET t.four_bbu_count = (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM t_equipment_bbu b WHERE t.dx_code=b.dx_code and b.network_type=4), t.four_bbu_power = (SELECT sum(power) FROM t_equipment_bbu b WHERE t.dx_code=b.dx_code and b.network_type=4); UPDATE t_base_station t SET t.five_bbu_count = (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM t_equipment_bbu b WHERE t.dx_code=b.dx_code and b.network_type=5), t.five_bbu_power = (SELECT sum(power) FROM t_equipment_bbu b WHERE t.dx_code=b.dx_code and b.network_type=5); UPDATE t_base_station t SET t.three_rru_count = (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM t_equipment_rru_aau ra WHERE t.dx_code=ra.dx_code and ra.network_type=3), t.three_rru_power = (SELECT sum(power) FROM t_equipment_rru_aau ra WHERE t.dx_code=ra.dx_code and ra.network_type=3); UPDATE t_base_station t SET t.four_rru_count = (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM t_equipment_rru_aau ra WHERE t.dx_code=ra.dx_code and ra.network_type=4), t.four_rru_power = (SELECT sum(power) FROM t_equipment_rru_aau ra WHERE t.dx_code=ra.dx_code and ra.network_type=4); UPDATE t_base_station t SET t.five_aau_count = (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM t_equipment_rru_aau ra WHERE t.dx_code=ra.dx_code and ra.network_type=5), t.five_aau_power = (SELECT sum(power) FROM t_equipment_rru_aau ra WHERE t.dx_code=ra.dx_code and ra.network_type=5); UPDATE t_base_station t SET t.olt_count = (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM t_equipment_olt o WHERE t.dx_code=o.dx_code), t.olt_power = (SELECT sum(power) FROM t_equipment_olt o WHERE t.dx_code=o.dx_code); UPDATE t_base_station t SET t.bf_count = (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM t_equipment_bf o WHERE t.dx_code=o.dx_code), t.bf_power = (SELECT sum(power) FROM t_equipment_bf o WHERE t.dx_code=o.dx_code); UPDATE t_base_station t SET t.ipran_count = (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM t_equipment_ipran i WHERE t.dx_code=i.dx_code), t.ipran_power = (SELECT sum(power) FROM t_equipment_ipran i WHERE t.dx_code=i.dx_code)
